p: This CMC was higher compared to others biosurfactants produced by S. marcescens strains but the reduction of surface tension was noticeably greater for biosurfactant produced by S. marcescens UCP 1549. Anyanwu et al. [ 26] reported the production of biosurfactant by S. marcescens NSK-1, which exhibited a CMC of 29 mg/L (0.03%) and reducing the surface tension of distilled water from 72 to 38 mN/m. Previously, S. marcescens UCP 1549 exhibited CMC of 2.5% with surface tension of 33.8 mN/m [ 44].
